name: History.forward
description: The History.forward() method causes the browser to move forward one page in the session history. It has the same effect as calling history.go(1).

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'History' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.

refs.name: HTML5
refs.description: The definition of 'History' in the 'HTML5' specification.
